paper_abstract: The paper presents a virtual institute, built in the form of an Internet-based platform, for distance learning in the field of supply-chain management. The Institute addresses students and teachers on university educational level, as well as employees in industry. Besides learning modules, the platform provides users with means to communicate, respectively to organise and execute project activities from remote locations. Means for on-line content editing, and course administration are made available as well. (C) 2009 Wiley Periodicals, Inc. Comput Appl Eng Educ 19: 81-88, 2011; View this article online at wileyonlinelibrary.com; DOI 10.1002/cae.20293
paper_title: Engineering Education on Supply-Chain Management for Students and for Employees in Industry
